PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07982010-06-17,  ,  ,  ,  ,  AAFC
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectAgri-Recovery - 2010 New Brunswick Potato Storage Loss Initiative
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food to provide assistance through the Agricultural Disaster Relief Program under the AgriRecovery Framework to potato producers in New Brunswick affected by extremely high potato storage losses through a contribution under the federal component of the 2010 New Brunswick Potato Storage Loss Initiative.
AttachmentsAttachment
